description.en: Unbeknownst to their friends and classmates, Nanoha and Chidori are dating. Watch as they try to keep their relationship secret!
description.es: A las espaldas de sus amigas y compañeras the salón, Nanoha y Chidori están saliendo juntas. ¡Velas tratando de mantener su relación en secreto!

altTitles.en: The World Where the Beloved Sister Disappeared
A World Without My Sister Who Everyone Loved

altTitles.zh: 备受宠爱的姐姐消失的世界

description.en:
"I hate you enough to want to kill you, Sienna."

I was my sister’s shadow all my life, and I was betrayed by her and died. But… people have changed since the day I came back in time.

"You're the only child Nacht chose."

"His Highness recognizes you as family."

Something's wrong. These people seem to mistake me for my older sister.

"I beg you, believe in us for once, that we care for you."

I once wanted to be loved. Now I fear that this mindset will become my weakness. One betrayal was enough. Everything is over when you bet everything in love. I just want to get my life back so…

title.en: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ～Koushaku-ka o Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru o Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru～

altTitles.ja: クラス≪無職≫の英雄譚～公爵家を追放されたが、実は殴っただけでスキルを獲得できるとわかり、大陸一の英雄に上り詰める～

altTitles.en: Class <<Unemployed>> Heroic Tale: Exiled from the Duke's House, but i found out that i can acquire skills just by punching and now i am climbing to the top of the continent ~
Chronicles of the Jobless Hero~Ousted From the Duke’s Manor, but With Skills Gained Through Punches, I Emerge as the Continent’s Ultimate Hero~

description.en:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one’s life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance…

- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp)
- [Alternative Raw Link: Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)
description.ja: 18歳になると神から「クラス」が与えられる世界。クラスの持つ「スキル」の有無は、どんな努力をも上回り、どんなクラスかでその後の人生が決まってしまう。そんな不平等な世界で、聖騎士を目指し訓練してきたリートは、クラス分けで無情にも<無職>を言い渡され、父親である公爵の手により、街を追放されてしまう。そして荷物持ちで糊口をしのいでいたある日、商隊が盗賊に襲われる。子どもを救うため戦うが、戦闘スキル持ちに敵うはずもなくリートは死を覚悟する。しかし、最後の抵抗で盗賊を殴った瞬間、頭の中に不思議な声が鳴り響き…。

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

title.en: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake

description.en: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

altTitles.th: เจ้าหญิงเบียทริซ

description.en:
Having previously been a slave in her youth, Chloe was revealed to be an illegitimate child of the King of Elpasa, and is raised to the level of a Princess and renamed Beatrice, all in order to secure a political marriage to a toady man, as the king was unwilling to marry his legitimate daughters to him. After two years of hellish marriage, the Kingdom of Elpasa falls before the blade of the Empire's Archduke, its greatest hero. In order to survive her new enslavement Princess Beatrice re-assumes the guise of 'Chloe' as a slave of the Empire. But then, she catches the eye of that very same hero…  
  
The Archduke wonders who is this squirrelly short-haired young woman, who is so surprisingly educated for a slave, and who is terrified of him, not knowing that he butchered the Elpasa Royal Family in front of her and enslaved her himself. What will become of them, since she proves to be one of his only sources of levity?  


---
description.ja: 帝国の侵略により滅亡したエルパーサ王国の王女ベアトリーチェは、正体を隠したまま帝国の奴隷クロエとしての人生を送ることになる。 新しい人生を切り開いて生きてきたのも束の間、彼女はエルパーサ王国を滅ぼし自分を殺そうとした帝国の英雄・アレクサンドロス大公の目につくようになる。 正体を隠すクロエと彼女の正体を知りたいアレクサンドロスのラブロマンス。
description.ru:
Когда королевство Эльпаса пало перед клинком величайшего героя империи, чтобы выжить, принцесса Беатрис приняла облик рабыни Хлои. Но потом она поймала взгляд того самого героя…

---

Updates every 10 days in the Kakao Page

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin 
as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. 
Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army. 
Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. 
Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity 
among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

description.en: What happens when a struggling witch meets an angsty vampire? Either love or war. Morgana belongs to a long line of witches, and Oz to the rival vampire clan. After a chance encounter… and maybe a few stray spells… these two need to find a way to work together, or risk all-out war between coven and clan.
description.pt-br: O que acontece quando uma bruxa em luta encontra um vampiro angustiado? Ou o amor ou a guerra. Morgana pertence a uma longa linhagem de bruxas, e Oz ao clã vampiro rival. Depois de um encontro casual… e talvez alguns feitiços errantes… estas duas precisam encontrar uma maneira de trabalhar juntas, ou arriscar uma guerra total entre os clãs.

altTitles.ja: エンジェル・ハート 1stシーズン

description.en:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics
description.ja: 台湾の黒社会組織の殺人兵器として養成された少女グラス・ハート。彼女は自殺を図るが、シティーハンターのパートナー槇村香の心臓を移植され一命をとりとめる。蘇ったグラス・ハートは組織を抜け出し、香の記憶に導かれるように新宿・リョウの元へ。やがて二人は香の心臓という絆で、再会をはたすのだが……!?
description.es-la: Una joven asesina taiwanesa con el nombre clave de "Corazón de Cristal" se suicidó saltando desde un edificio, y su corazón fue atravesado por una valla metálica. Milagrosamente, su vida se salvó gracias a un trasplante de corazón. Durante su recuperación comenzó a experimentar extraños sueños, que la llevaron a Japón en busca del donante de su corazón, que resulta ser Kaori Makimura, antigua compañera de City Hunter.

Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

description.en:
Stories about the lives and experiences of people living on an island in the desert, a place where the present and past intermingle.

**Won 9th place in the 2024 *Kono Manga ga Sugoi!* men's category rankings.**

The one and only weapon to take down the Dark Lord.
The Holy Sword.
And the Warrior who lost it…
Warrior seeks and seeks until he finds the Holy Sword.
10 years, 20 years, 30 years… From the Dragon’s Nest till the Spirit King’s Hideout
The Warrior seeks the Holy Sword still to this day.

How far can someone bully you until you snap? Daimon has had to endure Kojima's relentless teasing and nagging at work, to the point that bullying Daimon became customary inside the company. But could Kojima's attitude be because he actually likes Daimon? Let's find out!

In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/i-shall-master-this-family/info)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

---

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

description.th:
เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

---

description.zh:
意外穿成为了帝国最声名鼎盛的第一家族的私生女。虽然蒂亚头脑出众，也积累了大量的实战经验，但最终在爷爷去世后被叔叔扫地出门，而无能的叔叔很快便败光了家族的产业…… 意外死亡后，又一次重新回了小时候——这一世，蒂亚决定成为家主，重新让家族站上帝国巅峰！

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

description.en:
Leona is a young werewolf who wants to become friends with humans, vampires, and witches alike. In order to do so, she sets out into the human world and joins a local elementary school where she befriends only one person, Arthur. 10 years pass, and Leona is still set on becoming friends with all. But tragedy strikes and Leona suddenly becomes the adoptive mother of a newly transformed young vampire.

---

**Note:** Part of the [HEART Anthology](https://www.webtoons.com/en/heartwarming/heart-anthology/list?title_no=2191&page=1)
description.pt-br:
Leona é uma mulher-loba com um irmão bruxo. Ela quer fazer amizade com humanos enquanto encontra monstros e bruxas assustadores. Será que ela será capaz de encontrar seu próprio lugar? Em 2020 esse conto foi criado e idealizado pela Miyuli para uma competição de contos. Pertence ao mesmo universo de Morgana e Oz e que antecede os eventos da história principal onde conhecemos Morgana e suas aventura, conheçam a história  de Leona!

---

**Nota:** Parte da [HEART Anthology](https://www.webtoons.com/en/heartwarming/heart-anthology/list?title_no=2191&page=1)

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.

description.en: A girl with a rough life circumstances makes a life altering decision for the worst. In this tainted world, I shall live with the Original Sin of Purity…
description.fr: Une jeune fille aux conditions de vie difficiles prend une décision qui va changer sa vie pour le pire. Dans ce monde corrompu, je vivrai avec le péché originel de la pureté.
description.ru: В Моринаке происходит нечто диковинное для такого маленького, заснеженного городка… Убийство. Мидзуки Аикава является с повинной, утверждая, что это она убила и расчленила свою одноклассницу — Мако Игараси. Однако в исповеди преступницы чувствуется что-то неладное… Сможет ли кто-то разгадать тайну двух девочек, пытавшихся противостоять тьме этого мира?.. Узнайте в этом настоящем саспенсе!
description.uk: Дівчина з нелегкою долею вирішує змінити своє життя, однак все стає ще гірше. В цьому брудному світі я буду жити з Первородним Гріхом Чистоти.

description.en:
The loneliness and sadness of a boy, Sabu, who has awakened to paranormal abilities.... In prehistoric times, humans had the mental sensitivity to speak with their hearts and minds instead of words. Following the development of language ability, the ability that should have degenerated is revived!? A transfusion of blood from a girl awakens the psychic powers of a boy, Mutant Sabu, and he is born! The short story series about a hero with unusual abilities, which is considered one of Ishinomori's best-known  supernatural SF works and won the 1966 Kodansha Children's Manga Award along with "Cyborg 009," is now ready to begin!

---- 
- **As mentioned in the description, Mutant Sabu Won the 7th Kodansha Children's Manga Award in 1966, which it shared with Ishinomori's other, very famous, work Cyborg 009**

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ライジングサン

description.en: Rising Sun will revolve around Tsubasa as he aims to participate in the Olympics as a representative from Japan.

There are two kinds of people with special abilities: villains, who are driven by their evil desires, and psykers, who pursue justice and work against villains.

Cassian Lee is a very powerful psyker with a good heart. But one day, when he visits his friend in Greece, things take a wrong turn. Following an unexpected chain of events, Cassian ends up in the body of a Korean high school boy... who has just become a villain! 

Will his sense of justice win in the end or will he end up becoming a cold-blooded villain?
description.es-la: "¡Debes convertirte en el mayor mal para luchar contra el mal real!" Kasian muere tras ser incriminado por el asesinato de un compañero. Justo cuando pensaba que todo había terminado para él, su alma se transfiere a un niño ... ¡Un psíquico popular y de primera clase que era la envidia de todos se convierte en un villano de la noche a la mañana!

altTitles.th: จอมโจรอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Teenage magician Kaito Kuroba has a secret identity: that of Kaitou Kid, a famous internationally-known and wanted "phantom thief". Kaito took the identity after one day discovering that his late father was the original Kaitou Kid. Later on, he discovers his father, who died from an 'accident' during a magic trick, was really murdered because he would not steal the jewel Pandora for an evil organization. As Kaitou Kid, Kaito tries to find Pandora before that organization that killed his father do, and destroy it, leading Inspector Nakamori and his taskforce on the wildest jewel heists imaginable!
description.ja: 世紀の宝物を予告通りに手中し、闇から闇へと消え去る紳士・怪盗キッド！！見事なマジックで名刑事らの裏をかき、目指すは「正義」の完全犯罪！！今宵、神出鬼没の彼が狙う宝石は、時価4億円の「月の瞳」だ！！

title.en: Kajiya de Hajimeru Isekai Slow Life

altTitles.ja: 鍛冶屋ではじめる異世界スローライフ

altTitles.en: My Quiet Blacksmith Life in Another World
Different World Slow Life Begun at the Smithy

altTitles.zh-hk: 成為鐵匠在異世界度過悠閒人生

altTitles.uk: Помірне життя ремісничого в іншому світі

altTitles.ru: Умеренная жизнь ремесленника в другом мире

description.en:
One night, Eizo, a hapless corporate slave, saves a cat and gets hit by a truck. The cat which seems to be related to a parallel world, in return for his help, grants Eizo a skill of his wish and reincarnates him to another world. Eizo, who has craftsmanship as a hobby and wishes to use this skill for a living, chooses to be reincarnated as a blacksmith. And so he starts his life in another world as a blacksmith just as he wishes. However, Eizo's creations are at another different level that will shake this new world.  
  
---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/series/my-quiet-blacksmith-life-in-another-world)
description.fr: Une nuit, Eizo, un malheureux esclave d'entreprise, sauve un chat et se fait renverser par un camion. Le chat qui semble être lié à un monde parallèle, en échange de son aide, accorde à Eizo une compétence de son souhait et le réincarne dans un autre monde. Eizo, qui a l'artisanat comme passe-temps et souhaite utiliser cette compétence pour gagner sa vie, choisit de se réincarner en forgeron. Il commence donc sa vie dans un autre monde en tant que forgeron, comme il le souhaite. Cependant, les créations d'Eizo se situent à un autre niveau qui va bouleverser ce nouveau monde.
description.ja:
しがない社畜として生きていたエイゾウは、ある晩に猫を助けてトラックにはねられる。その猫は並行世界に関わる存在だったらしく、助けてくれた見返りとしてエイゾウに希望のスキルを与えたうえで異世界に転生させることを申し出る。エイゾウは趣味のモノ作りを生業としたいと思い、鍛冶屋として転生することを望む。その願いどおりに鍛冶屋として異世界でのモノ作りライフがはじまる。しかし、エイゾウのスキルは異世界を揺るがす業物を生み出すレベルだった――。

* **エイゾウ**
モノ作りと猫が大好きな元社畜。

* **サーミャ**
虎の獣人族の少女。エイゾウに命を助けてもらう。

---

altTitles.uk: Чи правда, що ви одружуєтесь? [365 днів до весілля]

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka

altTitles.th: แต่งงานที่ว่านี่เรื่องจริงเหรอครับ?

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

description.en: A chaotic 4-panel manga about the daily lives of siblings Ringabelle and Bigbell, who are bells.

altTitles.en: Top boys & Queen bee & KITAZAWA in A-class!!

description.en:
Masashi Kitazawa, a sophomore in high school, had a trauma. The trauma is that I was fat when I was a child!

Kitazawa, who diligently dieted and worked hard in middle school, grew up to be a handsome man and was supposed to lead a peaceful school life, but... In the new semester of high school, handsome men and beautiful girls have gathered in Kitazawa's 2nd year class A for some reason. What's more, he received a secret invitation from Ayame Yagyu, the most beautiful girl in her grade...!?
description.es-la: Kitazawa Masashi es parte de los 3 chicos más aputos de la preparatoria Nishiki pero oculta un pasado que no le quiere revelar a nadie, hasta que su compañera Yagyu Ayame lo descubre y le cuenta el secreto que ella también guarda, ahora serán cómplices en guardar el secreto del otro, mientras Kitazawa trata de mantener su estatus de "chico popular"...

altTitles.ja: 嫉妬を力に変える最強への道

description.en:
What should you do if transmigrated to a fantasy world and has become a son called the 'Human Race's Great Traitor'!

Don't worry, looking at his infinite epiphany system, all Bai Mo needs to do is to make others jealous of him!

No matter what kind of moves and cheats, as long as someone is jealous of him, Bai Mo can start an epiphany and let himself practice those to perfection in an instant!

So Bai Mo raised a lot of big villains around him, and occasionally molested them.

He liked to watch his enemies jealous and resentful of him, but they couldn't do that themselves!
description.id: Apa yang harus saya lakukan jika saya menjadi putra seorang yang dikenal sebagai pengkhianat umat manusia di dunia fantasi!  Jangan khawatir, melihat sistem pencerahannya yang tak terbatas, yang perlu dilakukan Bai Mo hanyalah membuat orang lain iri padanya!  Tidak peduli keterampilan atau buku rahasia apa pun, selama seseorang iri padanya, Bai Mo akan dapat membuka pencerahannya dan membiarkan dirinya mengembangkannya dengan sempurna dalam sekejap!  Oleh karena itu, Bai Mo telah mengangkat banyak penjahat besar di sekitarnya, dan sesekali menggodanya, dia suka melihat musuhnya iri dan membencinya, tetapi dia tidak bisa bertindak seperti dirinya sendiri!
description.zh: 越玄幻世界还变成了被称为人族大叛徒的儿子该怎么办！ 不急，看着自己的无限顿悟系统，白墨需要做的就是让别人嫉妒自己！无论何等功法、秘籍，只要有人嫉妒他，白墨就能开启顿悟，让自己瞬间将它修炼圆满！ 于是白墨身边养了很多大反派，偶尔调戏一下，就喜欢看着敌人嫉妒怨恨自己，却又干不了自己的样子！

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

description.en:
Is the woman a ghost or a witch?
A chance encounter between a girl and a beautiful, but not ghostly, girl who lives in a haunted house like a secret base.

The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

description.en:
"Hello fellow citizens. I am Yoshida the half-elf, working for the post office of the Imperial City of Idazig. My job is to deliver letters and documents to wherever you need them to be, whether it be a castle in the sky or the bottom of an abyss."

This is a comedy written by the biggest Middle-Ages geek, hitting the fantasy genre from an entirely new angle!

description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

description.en:
Gadis, an ogre that is feared by children, had found a human girl with a choker during one of his carriage raids. Under the supervision of Gadis' comrade, Mizary, they ensure that the girl is brought home so that they can have dinner for the night. This sweet and innocent girl has an enchanting smile… but with it comes with a lot of trouble. Additionally, the girl has a big secret…  
  


---

  
[Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/kurikimaru)

One day, Momoko is attacked by Pluie, a demon who's after her keepsake ring left by her mother. Just then, the angel Limone gives Momoko the Sacred Mirror, allowing her to transform into the legendary Love Angel Wedding Peach and drive away demons! And so, Peach and her fellow angels fight to protect the lovers of the world from demons pursuing them for their "wave of love"...!
___
Chapter numbers for the Selene Scans version do not match up, but nothing is missing.

description.en:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction!
A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube.

description.ja: 青春＝友情、努力、未来予知!? 最強無敵の異能力ギャルが送る、ごくごく普通の超常的な日常。 累計再生数1.6億回！本作の元となったYoutubeチャンネル「私立パラの丸高校」では、みらい＆ へー子の最強異能力ギャルズの他、光やクラスメイト達の声優ボイス付き動画がたくさん見れるので、ぜひチェックしてみてください!!

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
I Want to Be a Big Baddie

description.en:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Yi chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.

description.en:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
description.id: Tsukushi bermimpi ditolak saat menyatakan cintanya pada sahabatnya, Hinoka. Satu mimpi yang akan selalu menghantuinya, dan membuatnya mulai melihat Hinoka dengan cara yang berbeda.

altTitles.en: Legend of the Hungry Wolves (Itagaki Keisuke)

description.en:
What does it mean to be strong? What attracts men to fight in hand to hand combat? These and many other questions are explained and detailed in Garouden, a novel series by Yumemakura Baku (illustrated by celebrity manga author Itagaki Keisuke).  
  
Fighting expert Bunshichi Tanba enjoys defeating TV fighting champions and celebrities on the street, until he stumbles upon the underground wrestling club known as FAW (Federation of Amateur Wrestling), and unfortunately he is defeated by one of the underdogs of the wrestling world. He forces himself to improve and looks for a rematch.  
Years later, he returns better than ever, and his fights attract the attention of the two "monsters" of the fighting world who are in constant competition, Makoto "the Great" Tatsumi, owner of the FAW and possessing a power and charisma unrivaled in the ring, and "the Demon of Karate" Matsuo Shozan, owner of the best Karate schools in Japan and possessing a power and speed that's almost godlike.  
Both will try to recruit Tanba to their own side, and Tanba will experience a wold of fighting like he has never seen, with friends and rivals everywhere, and he will have to step up to the many challenges that confront him.  
Features other martial arts characters from his other fighting novel series, The Gate of the Lions. Currently the best "serious" martial arts manga title in Japan, this is another of Baku's masterpieces that, unlike his other fantasy epic titles, has surprising realism in its deep exploration of martial arts and those who use it.

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

description.en:
L.A.G, an unknown space where humans use abilities or skills through awakening, monsters appear on each floor and room, and missions are given accordingly.

The goal here is to reach the bottom. The protagonist repeats death and life countless times in the unknown space L.A.G. However, in this life, he has the ability to own unlimited passive skills and finally has a chance to escape there.

However, unlike what he has been through so far, he will not know an inch of the future as L.A.G continues to change. This is a desperate survival story in which no one can be trusted and continues to survive the hellish L.A.G, where there is no end in sight, and fights for escape from the bottom.
description.ko:
인간이 각성을 통해 능력이나 스킬을 쓸고 있고
각 층, 방마다 몬스터들이 나오고
거기에 따른 미션이 주어지는 미지의 공간 L.A.G

이곳의 목표는 최하층에 도달하는 것이다.
그 알 수 없는 공간 L.A.G에서
수없이 죽음과 삶을 반복하고 있는 주인공.
하지만 이번 생에는 패시브 스킬을
무한으로 소유할 수 있는 능력을 갖게 되고
드디어 이곳을 탈출할 수 있는 기회가 찾아온다.

그러나 L.A.G도 지금까지 자신의 겪어왔던 것과 달리
계속 변하게 되면서 한 치 앞도 알 수 없게 된다.
그 누구도 믿을 수 없고
끝이 보이지 않는 지옥 같은 L.A.G에서
끝까지 살아남아 최하층 탈출을 위해 싸워나가는
처절한 생존 서바이벌.
description.ru: Что будет, если дать расчётливому человеку возможность бесконечно наращивать количество пассивных навыков и поставить перед ним целью выбраться из заточения, в которое он попал против своей воли? L.A.G - мистическое сооружение с огромным количеством помещений и этажей, что бесконечно тянутся вниз. Здесь люди вынуждены сражаться за свою жизнь в попытках попасть на самый нижний этаж, в котором, предположительно, они найдут все ответы. В придачу ко всему, L.A.G играет роль системы, благодаря которой игроки получают навыки и постоянно наращивают боевой потенциал. Здесь не выживает сильнейший - сильнейшим становится тот, кто выжил.
description.pt-br:
L.A.G, um local desconhecido onde humanos através de um despertar conseguem utilizar perícias e habilidades especiais e precisam concluir missões derrotando os monstros que aparecem em cada sala de cada andar.
O objetivo é alcançar o último andar do subterrâneo. O protagonista repete o ciclo de vida e morte incontáveis vezes no espaço desconhecido de L.A.G.
No entanto, desta vez, foi lhe concedido a aptidão de possuir habilidades passivas ilimitadas, e, com isso, ele usará dessa oportunidade peculiar para escapar desse inferno.

description.en:
“[Class: Hotel Manager (Hidden) awakened!]

Mac x Mo x Gol x Coffee turns into potions,
A mysterious hotel where staying for a day restores stamina.
Awakened as the manager of this place!

All guests are hunters, and the hotel is in the middle of a dungeon.
Just by putting on a business smile, money rolls in, right?!

“Welcome, welcome to the Yeongchun Hotel!”

Through a combination of numerous injuries, a weak frame, and financial difficulties, the protagonist Lee Jinyong gave up on his path to being a baseball athlete and lived as a factory employee instead.

One day, the spirit of Kim Jinho, the baseball hero who was hailed as a legend in Korea, as well as Lee Jinyong’s idol who passed away 10 years ago, appeared before him. At the same time, an unknown notice appeared, stating that the ‘Baseball Manager’ would start, and Lee Jinyong gained an ability that gave him the constitution of a pitcher, similar to a game avatar.

He returns to the field to become <King of the Mound>.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uTjxJRaaBLw)
description.fr:
De par de nombreuses blessures et difficultés financières, le protagoniste Lee Jinyong a abandonné son objectif de devenir joueur de baseball et est à la place devenu ouvrier dans une usine. Un jour, l’esprit de Kim Jinho, le héros du baseball considéré comme une légende en Corée, et également idole de Lee Jinyong décédé il y a 10 ans, est apparu devant lui. Au même moment, une notification inconnue est apparue, disant que le “Gestionnaire de Baseball” allait commencer. Lee Jinyong a ensuite reçu une compétence lui donnant la constitution d’un lanceur, comme un avatar de jeu vidéo. Il revient sur le terrain pour devenir “King of the Mound”, le roi du monticule.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uTjxJRaaBLw)
description.ko:
잦은 부상과 부실한 체격, 경제적인 어려움까지 겹치며 야구선수의 길을 포기하고 공장 직원으로 살아가던 주인공 이진용. 

어느 날, 10년 전에 세상을 떠난 한국의 전설적인 야구 영웅이자 이진용의 우상, 김진호 선수의 유령이 보이기 시작한다. 이와 동시에 ‘베이스볼 매니저’가 시작된다는 알 수 없는 알림창이 뜨고, 마치 게임 캐릭터처럼 투수로서의 자질을 갖춰갈 수 있는 능력을 얻은 이진용. 


<마운드 위의 절대자>가 되기 위해, 그가 그라운드로 돌아온다.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uTjxJRaaBLw)
description.ru:
Из-за множества травм, слабого телосложения и финансовых трудностей главный герой Ли Джинён отказался от мечты стать бейсболистом и начал работать на фабрике. Однажды перед ним предстал дух Ким Джинхо, героя бейсбола, погибшего 10 лет назад, которого в Корее провозгласили легендой. Этот человек был кумиром Ли Джинёна. В то же время появилось неизвестное уведомление: "Загрузка Бейсбольный менеджер", а у Ли Джинёна появилась способность, из-за которой улучшились его питчерские навыки. Он возвращается в бейсбол, чтобы стать Королем поля.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uTjxJRaaBLw)
